description: Neon is a noble gas known for its bright red-orange glow in electrical discharge tubes. It is chemically inert, forming no known stable compounds. Neon is used in lighting, high-voltage indicators, and cryogenic refrigeration. Its low boiling point makes it effective for specialized cooling systems. Although rare in Earth’s atmosphere, neon is long-lasting and requires minimal maintenance once installed in lighting setups. Its distinct color and stability have made it iconic in signs and displays.
name: Neon
